name: ARIA (Carola Pettinato)
description:
Developers: Carola, Akwa.

Reference: asset https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/free-pixel-space-platform-pa...

Music:https://uppbeat.io/t/paul-yudin/circumvolve

Font: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Bangers

INSTRUCTIONS:

Press left and right to move, space bar to jump, collect all the bubbles to save your dying planet, Aria, before you run out of time!

Don't fall.

Press P for Menu settings.
